game.name: Farm Animal Truck Transporter Game
game.description:
Do you love animals? Are you also an enthusiast of online truck driving games? If so, we have got you covered with something special that you must try to find some really exciting and thrilling hours. As you know that people visit a zoo to watch different animals and have fun. Even their presence helps visitors to make them happy and teach different things about different types of animals. Today you have to transport some wild animals to the popular zoo of the city in Farm Animal Truck Transporter.
Your objective in this brand new racing game is to drive multiple vehicles like trucks, cranes and excavators. Join us as a cargo transporter and get ready to drive the biggest cargo transport truck of the city like a pro without download games! Try to transport animals and cattle including cows, sheep and horses from the city to the farm! Remember you also have to drop them back to the city from the farm. Do not forget to transport the racing horses as well apart from the farm animals. 
Look into the screen and drive different animals to the multiple checkpoints on time in this HTML5 truck driving simulation game! Drive your vehicle through the beautiful streets of the city that is full of different skyscrapers and buildings without damaging your cargo of animals! Collect your wages by reaching your destination before the time runs out in this cool truck challenge! Choose the truck, mode, and animal you want to pick and drop! Complete all tasks to earn cash and buy new vehicles in this free online animal game!
